original_text: And if ye have erred, and not observed all these commandments, which the Lord hath spoken unto Moses,
korean_text: 너희가 그릇 범죄하여 여호와가 모세에게 말씀하신 이 모든 명령을 지키지 못하되

sentences.original_text: and not observed all these commandments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 모든 계명을 지키지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: which the Lord hath spoken unto Moses
